Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, but all returned errors such as "conda: not found" or "source: not found". I tried multiple commands suggested, including activating the environment with "conda activate arcgis" and "source /opt/conda/bin/activate arcgis", but all returned errors. I also attempted to activate the environment with different paths, such as "/usr/local/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh" and "/home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate", but all returned errors.
"""
